column5: News from Browns' Clearwater West Lodge regarding Winter Lake Trout Fishing. Big fish caught so far 17, 22, 24, 28 and 18 January 28, 2002. Ice conditions are great 8 to 12 inches and about 4 inches of snow on the ice. Deluxe Accommodations available. If you are looking for a place to go Ice Fishing call 1-800-900-4240 for reservations or visit us at www.brownsclearwaterlodge.com. Walleyes are definitely available. Clearwater West and White Otter Lakes, Atikokan, Ontario, Canada, 2 hours from the International Falls, MN Border.
